## IBlit.blitCanvas() method

Converts and blits pixels into given canvas at position `x`<!-- -->, `y` (0,0 by default). If canvas is smaller than source buffer, only the top-left region will be written.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
blitCanvas(canvas: HTMLCanvasElement, x?: number, y?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  canvas | <code>HTMLCanvasElement</code> |  |
|  x | <code>number</code> |  |
|  y | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
